groups.description: Number of filter groups for the 3x3 convolution layer in bottleneck block. (default: ``1``)

initializers.description: The initialization strategy for the model

loss_name.description: Name of loss function. E.g. 'soft_cross_entropy' or 'binary_cross_entropy_with_logits'. (default: ``soft_cross_entropy``)

model_name.description: ResNet architecture to instantiate, must be one of ['resnet18', 'resnet34', 'resnet50', 'resnet101', 'resnet152']. (default: '')

num_classes.description: The number of classes.  Needed for classification tasks

pretrained.description: If True, use ImageNet pretrained weights. Default: ``False``. This parameter is deprecated and will soon be removed.

weights.description: If provided, pretrained weights can be specified, such as with ``IMAGENET1K_V2``. (default: ``None``)

width_per_group.description: Initial width for each convolution group. Width doubles after each stage. (default: ``64``)
